g.title: Sheet.290
g.desc: Here, we start the transaction by adding a payload to the TX ...
g.text: Here, we start the transaction by adding a payload to the TX FIFO using esb_write_payload()

g.title: Sheet.335
g.desc: Event with event ID ESB_EVENT_RX_RECEIVED (We received a ...
g.text: Event with event ID ESB_EVENT_RX_RECEIVED (We received a payload in the ACK packet that is ready to be read)

g.title: Sheet.350
g.desc: If both events occur, the ESB_EVENT_TX_SUCCESS event alwa...
g.text: If both events occur, the ESB_EVENT_TX_SUCCESS event always occurs before the ESB_EVENT_RX_RECEIVED event

g.title: Sheet.365
g.desc: Here, we preload a TX payload using esb_write_payload() (...
g.text: Here, we preload a TX payload using esb_write_payload() (Optional)
